Create a widget which uses a smart folder as source for the carousel images or alternatively use web content items for carousel slides.\ Write the HTML in the widget code and don't use this complexity in the rich text editor.
In widget dialogs you can configure all of this as you need it. Would recommend to go this way.
In your current solution you'll have to replace the HTML with the variant of your new carousel with other/more slides.
